snippet: Nassau County in New York used a tobacco settlement to plug the holes in its budget by winning over investors who otherwise considered it a bad credit risk.
lead_paragraph: Nassau County in New York used a tobacco settlement to plug the holes in its budget by winning over investors who otherwise considered it a bad credit risk.

headline.seo: Nassau County Shows Risks of Patching With Tobacco Bonds
headline.main: Settlement Money Patched Nassau County Budget Gaps
headline.print_headline: Settlement Money Patched Nassau County Budget Gaps
